# Yplate

## Detect Vehicle Number plates with YOLOv3 powered by OpenCV 3.x

## This is a dev package and doesn't contain any utilities other than showing version and model configurataion
    
### Check `yplate` version:

    yplate -v

### Model Configuration:

    yplate --config
